# Glyph Forge

Pip installable client for Glyph Forge API

## Installation

```bash
pip install glyph-forge
```

## Usage

```python
from glyph_forge import GlyphClient

# Initialize client
client = GlyphClient()
```

## Documentation

For more information, visit [glyphapi.ai](https://www.glyphapi.ai/)
